data.description:
Teo is a virtual platform for the dental community to get together to study and explore new materials, instruments, and new developments in dentistry.

- Form groups to study and discuss dentistry in virtual environment

- Create and practice step-by-step custom procedures alone or with others

- Load your own 3D models to share and annotate with guests

- Save your scene and make 3D recordings for others to play back to watch and repeat your actions

- Discuss, share and collaborate with others with a single Point of View

- Practice core dental concepts to create muscle memory

- Demonstrate new instruments in the virtual community

- Connect to the virtual dental community anywhere, anytime

- Hold virtual class for world wide dental professionals

changelog.change_log:
- AR mode added.  Toggle between AR and VR mode for Quest 3 users.
- Fixed issue with new signups with no first and last name.
- Updated Unity version.

- Updated endodontic canal tracking for allow for partial cuts to be made in canals for improved accuracy
- Adjusted endodontic paper point drying to create more accurate fluid absorption
- Fixed issue with user coming back from procedure in network session
- Fixed issue with save file locking up anesthesia discipline
- Fixed several memory leaks to improve performance

- Improved loading with new loading screen displaying user's license
- Added tool bar to make functions more accessible
- Improved endodontic root canal functions with accurate gutta percha packing
- Added continuous wave gutta percha obturation for root canals
- Fixed issue when resetting specific cuttable teeth

- Added 6 new burs
- Incorporated Anesthesia license into Teo
- Improved hand animations
- Improved sounds

- Updated tool sounds and networked them
- Added rubber dam to tooth 14 procedure
- Updated next canal button to more user-friendly location

- Improved dental mirror 
- Added rubber dam to tooth #9 procedure
- Improved feedback if wifi isn't active and auto-start internet connection if hibernated before logging in

- Added networking to endo procedures
- Improved cutting method for multiple layer models

- Updated Licensure dentition
- Fixed issue with custom model sizing
- Fixed issue with resizing in procedure

- Added ability to go back in Endodontic procedures
- Improved voxel cutting

- Create spatial recordings in Teo up to 5 minutes
- Playback spatial recordings inside Teo
- Share spatial recordings with friends and groups
- Improved endo procedures and tool and model loading
Improved performance of endodontic procedures
voice needed

- Added multiple canal function for endodontic procedures
- Improved gutta percha packing function to be more realistic

- Fix endodontics procedure ruler block
- Improve flush and sealer functions in endodontic procedures
- Improved gutta percha cut and packing step in procedures

- Fixed issue with data load upon update
- Adjusted default table height
- Updated endodontic procedures with new ruler block
- Fixed issue with guest ability to grab dentition while not in control
- Set voice region for all users in a network session

- Updated network functions to improve reliability and host to guest syncing
- Improved UI flow for discipline functions
- Improved function of forceps and paper points in Endodontic procedures

- Updated center panel UI to improve and clarify flow
- Fixed issues with admin login and device registration
- Improved endodontics procedure with tool updates for forceps
voice needed

- Added endodontic procedure for tooth #9
- Improved hand grab for hand tools
- Added endodontic tools for cleaning cutting tools, setting stopper and cutting and packing gutta percha
- Updated access teeth in endodontic procedures
